p: For some sectors, SBTi allows or requires companies to use sector-specific target-setting methods, of which some are variants of ACA and SDA (e.g., for aviation [31]) and others take a distinctly different approach (e.g., for financial institutions [32]). For other sectors, dedicated methods and guidance are still under development. Importantly, companies in the emission-intensive oil and gas sector and the forest, land, and agriculture sector can commit to setting SBTs but must wait for sector-specific guidance in order to submit targets for validation [33, 34].
